name: Critical Action: FPS Shooter
description:
FPS? Well, as a gun shooting fan, you can expect more than fps shooter excitements. Different from traditional fps shooter games, Critical Action is a brand new TPS, third-person shooter game designed exclusively on mobile. Hold and shoot with just one finger, you're ensured to enjoy the greatest fun of exciting shooting.

Run, shoot, cover! Eliminate all enemies and terrrorists ahead. Let's shoot for peace!

FREE TPS SHOOTING MOBILE GAME OF 2020! Snipers, machine guns, rifles, tommy guns, shotguns...Various of classic gun weapons for you to choose freely and enjoy this addictive shooting game! Pick all of them and go now!

ONE-HAND EASY PLAY - Easy gameplay can also bring extraordinary console gun shooter experience. You can play anytime, anywhere and take down enemies with incredible shooting skills.

REALISTIC BATTLE MAPS - HD graphics of train station, desert, sewer, abandoned warehouse...your enemies could be anywhere. Master the battlegrounds and get ready to take action and win the fight strategically.

If you have further comments or questions, please contact us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/BananaGame.cc/
